REINA_HUB: ^NAME: What can we do for ya?

c-0: ^Reina: How dare you! We are travelling collectors — antiquarians, if you will!
^Reina: Collectors. Although... we do have quite a few treasures to trade, if you're interested.
^Reina: Well, do you have a Luitaere collection?

c-1: ^Reina: Well here is your opportunity to start one!
c-2: ^Reina: No problem! Here is a great opportunity to start one!
g-0: ^ We recently came into possession of two beautiful, hand-painted, silver-embossed, one-of-a-kind—
^Maliya: It's a pair of Luitaere cards. The five of Dreams and seven of Stones, I believe.
^Caeran: And quite a find, as well. Only 55 rings each.
^Maliya: Huh? Collectors would buy them for 90 each—
^Reina: Let's just say 100 rings for the pair! What do you say?
